trip_plan.day_plan_text: Your Parisian adventure begins with a journey into the heart of art and history at the Louvre Museum, where you can gaze at iconic masterpieces like the Mona Lisa and the Venus de Milo. Following your museum visit, take a leisurely walk through the beautiful Tuileries Garden, a perfect spot for relaxation and people-watching. As evening approaches, you'll embark on a scenic Seine River cruise, offering breathtaking views of Paris's illuminated landmarks, including a sparkling Eiffel Tower.
trip_plan.day_plan_sequence: visit(Louvre Museum), walk(Tuileries Garden), cruise(Seine River)
trip_plan.image_prompt: A stunning, wide-angle photograph of the Louvre Museum at twilight. The iconic glass pyramid is brilliantly illuminated, casting a golden glow on the surrounding courtyard. The sky is a deep, velvety blue, and the classic French architecture of the former royal palace provides a majestic backdrop. The ground is slightly damp, creating beautiful reflections of the lights. The overall style is reminiscent of a high-end travel magazine cover, capturing the elegance and romance of Paris.
trip_plan.audio_script: Welcome to your first day in Paris! We'll start by exploring the artistic wonders of the Louvre Museum. Then, we'll enjoy a relaxing stroll through the scenic Tuileries Garden. To cap off the day, we'll take a magical boat cruise along the Seine River, witnessing the city's landmarks light up the night sky.

trip_plan.day_plan_text: Today is dedicated to the artistic and bohemian spirit of Paris. You'll start your day at the Musée d'Orsay, housed in a magnificent former railway station, to admire its world-renowned collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist art. [3, 4, 10, 11] In the afternoon, you'll wander through the charming streets of Montmartre, a historic neighborhood known for its artistic heritage. The day culminates with a visit to the magnificent Sacré-Cœur Basilica, perched atop the highest point in the city, offering panoramic views of Paris.
trip_plan.image_prompt: A romantic and atmospheric shot of the cobblestone streets of Montmartre in the early evening. A classic Parisian street lamp casts a warm, inviting light on the scene. In the background, the stunning Sacré-Cœur Basilica is visible, its white domes glowing against the dusky sky. The style is soft-focused and painterly, evoking the artistic soul of the neighborhood.
trip_plan.audio_script: Day two in Paris is all about art and charm! We'll begin at the Musée d'Orsay to see incredible Impressionist paintings. Later, we'll get lost in the artistic streets of Montmartre and end our day with breathtaking city views from the beautiful Sacré-Cœur Basilica.

trip_plan.day_plan_text: On your final day, you'll immerse yourself in the grandeur of Parisian landmarks. Begin with a visit to the iconic Arc de Triomphe, where you can climb to the top for a spectacular view of the Champs-Élysées and the city's layout. Afterward, take a stroll down the world-famous Champs-Élysées, indulging in some window shopping. The trip concludes with a visit to the magnificent Eiffel Tower, where you can ascend to its viewing platforms for an unforgettable panoramic perspective of Paris.
trip_plan.day_plan_sequence: visit(Arc de Triomphe), walk(Champs-Élysées), visit(Eiffel Tower)
trip_plan.image_prompt: A dramatic and awe-inspiring photo of the Eiffel Tower from the Champ de Mars. The iconic iron lattice structure is bathed in golden light as the sun sets, creating a striking silhouette against a colorful sky of orange, pink, and purple hues. The style is epic and cinematic, capturing the monumental scale and enduring beauty of this world-famous landmark.
trip_plan.audio_script: For our last day, we're taking in some of Paris's most famous sights! We'll start with a climb up the Arc de Triomphe for amazing views. Then, we'll walk the glamorous Champs-Élysées. We'll end our trip on a high note, literally, with a visit to the iconic Eiffel Tower for a stunning farewell to the city.
